title: Kylie Jenner flashes Tyga ink she had altered after split as she says 2am studio visit was innocent
text:
Kylie Jenner flashed the Tyga tattoo she had altered after their split on Thursday.

The original ink read 't', but Kylie altered it in 2017 after their breakup to 'la', a nod to her hometown.

Her latest Instagram upload comes after the 22-year-old broke her silence on her 2am visit to a hotel where Tyga had been using the recording studio.

Dropping hints?: Kylie Jenner posted an Instagram album Thursday in which she flashed her ankle tattoo reading: 'la,' her hometown

'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is. There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at,' Kylie explained on Twitter this Thursday.

She was glimpsed in the small hours of Wednesday heading to West Hollywood's Sunset Marquis Hotel while Tyga was working in its studio.

The reality starlet had been partying at the nightclub Delilah with her pals Anastasia 'Stassi' Karanikolaou and Kelsey Calemine before heading to the hotel.

On Tuesday, it emerged that Kylie was on a break with 28-year-old rapper Travis Scott, the father of her one-year-old daughter Stormi.

Throwback: Her ink originally read: 't,' when she got it in 2016 as a nod to her then-boyfriend Tyga (left), but she had it altered after they broke up early in 2017

Details: On Tuesday, it emerged that Kylie was on a break with 28-year-old rapper Travis Scott, the father of her one-year-old daughter Stormi

Kylie also tweeted Thursday: 'Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi !! our friendship and our daughter is priority'.

She struck up her romance with Travis shortly after her 2017 split from Tyga, 29, who began dating her when she was a teenager.

Kylie debuted her: 'la' tattoo alteration in July 2017, less than a month after she and Travis got matching butterfly ink on their ankles.

Holding forth: Her latest Instagram upload comes after the 22-year-old broke her silence on her 2am visit to a hotel where Tyga had been using the recording studio

The way they were: Kylie and Travis are pictured this February on the red carpet at the Grammy Awards held at the Staples Center in Los Angeles

Flashback: Tyga, who began dating Kylie when she was a teenager, is pictured with her in September 2016 at New York Fashion Week

Tyga and Kylie recently came face to face the Sapphire Las Vegas Gentlemen's club in late August, according to TMZ.

She was the strip club, which offers private rooms and pole dancing, for Sofia Richie's 21st birthday celebrations.

Sofia, the daughter of Lionel Richie, is in a relationship with Scott Disick, who has three children with Kylie's half-sister Kourtney Kardashian.

Meanwhile, Tyga shares his six-year-old son King Cairo with Blac Chyna, who has a two-year-old daughter called Dream with Kourtney's younger brother Rob.

Family time: On Thursday evening Kylie shared a heartwarming Insta Stories video of her little pride and joy watching the Disney animated classic The Little Mermaid
description: The original ink read 't', but Kylie altered it after their breakup to 'la', a nod to her hometown. Her latest Instagram upload comes after Kylie broke her silence on her 2am visit  to a hotel where Tyga.
